name:name: # ^ This file demonstrates COG (Code Generation) blocks.
# ^ The ###[[[...###]]] block contains Lua code that generates rows dynamically.
# ^ Code between the markers is executed, and its return value replaces the content
# ^ between ###]]] and ###[[[end]]]. The code has access to code libraries (gameLib).
###    rows[#rows+1] = name .. "\t" .. i .. "\t" .. hp .. "\t" .. atk .. "\t" .. def .. "\t" .. gold
# Manual entry after the COG-generated block (showing that generated and manual rows can coexist)
